snippet: Germany’s foreign minister, Frank-Walter Steinmeier, alluded to the standoff between Russia and Ukraine in grim tones on Tuesday after talks in Moscow with his Russian counterpart, Sergey V. Lavrov.
abstract: German Foreign Min Frank-Walter Steinmeier expresses grim outlook on resolving standoff between Russia and Ukraine; comments follow meeting with Russian counterpart Sergey V Lavrov.
lead_paragraph: Germany’s foreign minister, Frank-Walter Steinmeier, alluded to the standoff between Russia and Ukraine in grim tones on Tuesday after talks in Moscow with his Russian counterpart, Sergey V. Lavrov.

headline.main: Russia: German Official Expresses ‘No Optimism’ on Ukraine Conflict
headline.print_headline: Russia: German Official Expresses ‘No Optimism’ on Ukraine Conflict
